chapter.title: Library vtkIntegration
chapter.para: This library is designed as bridge between libImaging and VTK - it can convert images from Medv4D project to VTK representation. So VTK viewers and filters can be applied to our data.

section.para: This class is implementation of VTK interface vtkImageAlgorithm. So it can be easily included to VTK pipeline.
This class takes instance of our implmentation of raster images and create VTK version of that.
